home.title:
Elevate your
nails & shine
home.subtitle: For beautiful nails, you've come to the right place

services.title: Featured Treatments
services.first-service-paragraph: The electric file removes dead skin from the cuticle for a super sleek end result
services.second-service-paragraph: Natural nail is strengthened with a building gel + gel polish color of your choice
services.third-service-paragraph: Want to stand out even more with beautiful nail art on your nails? Choose your favourite design
services.fourth-service-paragraph: Your toenails painted in a Gel polish of your choice (including foot bubble bath)

products.title: The best quality a-branded products
products.subtitle:
Experience Unmatched Nail Care with Our Selection of Top-Quality A-Branded Products.
At BeautyNails, we exclusively use premium brands to ensure your nails receive the best treatment and care available.

about-me.title: I’m Sarah,
about-me.subtitle: Your nailstylist
about-me.paragraph: With over three years of experience in the industry, I am certified by Magnetic and have accumulated more than 15 professional education certificates along with over 20 course participation certificates.

about.paragraph: “My genuine interest in people ensures that every visit to BeautyNails is not just a service, but an experience of relaxation and beauty”

quality.title: Discover the magic
quality.subtitle:
At BeautyNails, we prioritize your convenience and comfort.
Enjoy a complimentary coffee or tea while you wait in our cozy waiting area.
With an efficient online booking system, scheduling your next appointment is just a click away.
quality.first-paragraph: We provide unique DUO treatments and special packages for weddings and mother-daughter moments, ensuring a luxurious experience for every occasion.
quality.second-paragraph: We ensure a safe and hygienic environment. Our salon includes essential amenities like a toilet and ample space, allowing you to bring a friend to share the experience.
quality.third-paragraph: With over 250 unique 5-star reviews and a 5-day guarantee on treatments, BeautyNails is dedicated to providing exceptional service and quality.
quality.fourth-paragraph: Using only top-quality A-branded products, we offer complimentary nail oil and cuticle cream for at-home care.

testimonials.first-testimonial: “Just had the most relaxing manicure. My nails feel rejuvenated and look gorgeous!”
testimonials.second-testimonial: “Lovely session getting my nails done. And the nail art is stunning!”
testimonials.third-testimonial: “Had a great time at the nail salon today. The new gel polish looks fabulous!”

appoint.title: Shine like never before
appoint.subtitle: We like to take the time to make your hands shine

about-me-det.first-paragraph: At Beauty Nails, every detail matters. We specialize in enhancing the beauty of your hands with modern nail techniques and high-quality products. Here, we believe hand care is a form of self-expression, and our team is dedicated to providing you with a unique and personalized experience in a comfortable setting.
about-me-det.second-paragraph: Beauty Nails began with a clear vision: to create a space where everyone can express themselves through the art of nails. From our first designs, we committed to offering a service that combines creativity and professionalism.
about-me-det.third-title: Most popular, clean, and recommended nail salon
about-me-det.third-paragraph: We prioritize hygiene, comfort, and the latest trends in nail artistry to provide an experience that goes beyond expectations. Step into a space where beauty and care come together to create the perfect look.
